verses.verse: The word<WH1697> that came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from Jehovah<WH3068>, saying<WH559>,

Stand <WH5975> in the gate<WH8179> of Jehovah<WH3068>'s house<WH1004>, and proclaim<WH7121> there this word<WH1697>, and say<WH559>, Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>, all ye of Judah<WH3063>, that enter in<WH935> at these gates<WH8179> to worship<WH7812> Jehovah<WH3068>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, Amend<WH3190> your ways<WH1870> and your doings<WH4611>, and I will cause you to dwell<WH7931> in this place<WH4725>.
Trust <WH982> ye not in lying<WH8267> words<WH1697>, saying<WH559>, The temple<WH1964> of Jehovah<WH3068>, the temple<WH1964> of Jehovah<WH3068>, the temple<WH1964> of Jehovah<WH3068>, are these.
For if ye thoroughly<WH3190> amend<WH3190> your ways<WH1870> and your doings<WH4611>; if ye thoroughly<WH6213> execute<WH6213> justice<WH4941> between a man<WH376> and his neighbor<WH7453>;

if ye oppress<WH6231> not the sojourner<WH1616>, the fatherless<WH3490>, and the widow<WH490>, and shed<WH8210> not innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in this place<WH4725>, neither walk<WH3212> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> to your own hurt<WH7451>:
then will I cause you to dwell<WH7931> in this place<WH4725>, in the land<WH776> that I gave<WH5414> to your fathers<WH1>, from of old<WH5769> even for<WH5704> evermore<WH5769>.
Behold <WH982>, ye trust in lying<WH8267> words<WH1697>, that cannot profit<WH3276>.

Will ye steal<WH1589>, murder<WH7523>, and commit adultery<WH5003>, and swear<WH7650> falsely<WH8267>, and burn incense<WH6999> unto Baal<WH1168>, and walk<WH1980> after<WH310> other<WH312> gods<WH430> that ye have not known<WH3045>,

and come<WH935> and stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me in this house<WH1004>, which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, and say<WH559>, We are delivered<WH5337>; that ye may do<WH6213> all these abominations<WH8441>?

Is this house<WH1004>, which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, become a den<WH4631> of robbers<WH6530> in your eyes<WH5869>? Behold<WH7200>, I, even I, have seen it<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

But go<WH3212> ye now unto my place<WH4725> which was in Shiloh<WH7887>, where I caused my name<WH8034> to dwell<WH7931> at the first<WH7223>, and see<WH7200> what I did<WH6213> to it for<WH6440> the wickedness<WH7451> of my people<WH5971> Israel<WH3478>.

And now<WH6213>, because ye have done all these works<WH4639>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, and I spake<WH1696> unto you<WH7925>, rising up early and speaking<WH1696>, but ye heard<WH8085> not<WH7121>; and I called you<WH6030>, but ye answered not:

therefore will I do<WH6213> unto the house<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, wherein ye trust<WH982>, and unto the place<WH4725> which I gave<WH5414> to you and to your fathers<WH1>, as I did<WH6213> to Shiloh<WH7887>.
And I will cast you out<WH7993> of my sight<WH6440>, as I have cast out<WH7993> all your brethren<WH251>, even the whole seed<WH2233> of Ephraim<WH669>.

Therefore pray<WH6419> not thou for this people<WH5971>, neither lift up<WH5375> cry<WH7440> nor prayer<WH8605> for them<WH1157>, neither make intercession<WH6293> to me<WH8085>; for I will not hear thee.
Seest <WH7200> thou not what they do<WH6213> in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> and in the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389>?

The children<WH1121> gather<WH3950> wood<WH6086>, and the fathers<WH1> kindle<WH1197> the fire<WH784>, and the women<WH802> knead<WH3888> the dough<WH1217>, to make<WH6213> cakes<WH3561> to the queen<WH4446> of heaven<WH8064>, and to pour out<WH5258> drink-offerings<WH5262> unto other<WH312> gods<WH430>, that they may provoke me to anger<WH3707>.
Do they provoke me to anger<WH3707>? saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>; do they not provoke themselves<WH1322>, to the confusion of their own faces<WH6440>?

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Behold<WH639>, mine anger and my wrath<WH2534> shall be poured out<WH5413> upon this place<WH4725>, upon man<WH120>, and upon beast<WH929>, and upon the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704>, and upon the fruit<WH6529> of the ground<WH127>; and it shall burn<WH1197>, and shall not be quenched<WH3518>.
Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: Add<WH5595> your burnt-offerings<WH5930> unto your sacrifices<WH2077>, and eat<WH398> ye flesh<WH1320>.

For I spake<WH1696> not unto your fathers<WH1>, nor commanded<WH6680> them in the day<WH3117> that I brought them out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, concerning<WH1697> burnt-offerings<WH5930> or sacrifices<WH2077>:

but this thing<WH1697> I commanded<WH6680> them<WH559>, saying, Hearken<WH8085> unto my voice<WH6963>, and I will be your God<WH430>, and ye shall be my people<WH5971>; and walk<WH1980> ye in all the way<WH1870> that I command<WH6680> you<WH3190>, that it may be well with you.

But they hearkened<WH8085> not<WH5186>, nor inclined their ear<WH241>, but walked<WH3212> in their own counsels<WH4156> and in the stubbornness<WH8307> of their evil<WH7451> heart<WH3820>, and went backward<WH268>, and not forward<WH6440>.

Since the day<WH3117> that your fathers<WH1> came forth out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> unto this day<WH3117>, I have sent<WH7971> unto you all my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, daily<WH3117> rising up early<WH7925> and sending them<WH7971>:
yet they hearkened<WH8085> not unto me<WH5186>, nor inclined their ear<WH241>, but made their neck<WH6203> stiff<WH7185>: they did worse<WH7489> than their fathers<WH1>.
And thou shalt speak<WH1696> all these words<WH1697> unto them<WH8085>; but they will not hearken to thee<WH7121>: thou shalt also call unto them<WH6030>; but they will not answer thee.

And thou shalt say<WH559> unto them<WH1471>, This is the nation that hath not hearkened<WH8085> to the voice<WH6963> of Jehovah<WH3068> their God<WH430>, nor received<WH3947> instruction<WH4148>: truth<WH530> is perished<WH6>, and is cut off<WH3772> from their mouth<WH6310>.

Cut off<WH1494> thy hair<WH5145>, O Jerusalem<WH7993>, and cast it away, and take up<WH5375> a lamentation<WH7015> on the bare heights<WH8205>; for Jehovah<WH3068> hath rejected<WH3988> and forsaken<WH5203> the generation<WH1755> of his wrath<WH5678>.

For the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> have done<WH6213> that which is evil<WH7451> in my sight<WH5869>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>: they have set<WH7760> their abominations<WH8251> in the house<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>, to defile it<WH2930>.

And they have built<WH1129> the high places<WH1116> of Topheth<WH8612>, which is in the valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011>, to burn<WH8313> their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> in the fire<WH784>; which I commanded<WH6680> not<WH5927>, neither came it into my mind<WH3820>.

Therefore <WH3117>, behold, the days come<WH935>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, that it shall no more be called<WH559> Topheth<WH8612>, nor The valley<WH1516> of the son<WH1121> of Hinnom<WH2011>, but The valley<WH1516> of Slaughter<WH2028>: for they shall bury<WH6912> in Topheth<WH8612>, till there be no<WH369> place to bury<WH4725>.

And the dead bodies<WH5038> of this people<WH5971> shall be food<WH3978> for the birds<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064>, and for the beasts<WH929> of the earth<WH776>; and none shall frighten them away<WH2729>.

Then will I cause to cease<WH7673> from the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063>, and from the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the voice<WH6963> of mirth<WH8342> and the voice<WH6963> of gladness<WH8057>, the voice<WH6963> of the bridegroom<WH2860> and the voice<WH6963> of the bride<WH3618>; for the land<WH776> shall become a waste<WH2723>.
